Name: National Geographic Angry Birds Star Wars: The Science Behind the Saga

ReviewList.Text: I am really happy with this book because mixes science fiction with real facts. Even is a great book for children and for school. Do not hesitate and buy it!

This book is awesome. I have been a fan of Angry Birds since I bought Angry Birds for 3DS and I have been a fan of Star Wars since I was a child. This book had beautiful and funny pictures. In this book, this book explains the difference between Sci-Fi and Reality. This book had all of the Angry Birds as Star Wars characters and this book explains everything that we do not have in the Star Wars world like the robots we have are almost similar to the droids in Star Wars, the space suits we have are almost similar to Darth Vader's armor, even a blowtorch that is almost similar to a lightsaber and many more. I gave this Angry Birds book a 5 star rating and I recommended this to Star Wars fans.

My son loves angry birds, especially angry birds star wars.  The book has a wide range of technology topics, many of which gave us good opportunities for discussion.  It was setup in short chapters, usually 2 pages, which made it perfect as a bed time book.

My 3 year old (now 4) loves this book. He loves angry birds, especially the star wars characters. We read a couple of pages every night before bed, I love how it incorporates a lot of science in it, not just the story.

I have a kid who is into EVERYTHING star wars... and he loved this book. It was combining his two favorite things... Star wars and angry birds. I recommend this for any fan of either, or both...creative and clever

My son has the other two Angry Birds NG books and asked for this one too. Kids learn while seeing their favorite characters. A little pricey, but he likes it. Pictures are high quality and it's well written.

If you want to know the characters and the idea behind the machines in our everyday life, this is the book. Not recommended for young kids below 7. It is very exhaustive, even though the book is colorful.
My son ordered this book and really enjoyed it. My wife is also a teacher and she has used it and several others in the series for her classes. They are a fun way for the kids to learn something.
Wicked! My son loved it. He enjoyed reading it and learned a lot, lots of fun but also lots of facts. A must for the thinking AB fan!
who wouldn't appreciate some honest to god science looming behind the Angry Birds installment and then watching your 6 year old actually engaging with it?
My nephew likes both Star Wars and Angry Birds, so this is right up his alley. This is a great way to encourage him to read for fun
Blah!  (And this is from someone who will buy almost any children's book that will get a boy to read).
I'm a fan of Star Wars and my son currently loves Angry Birds Star Wars. I love how they stay true to the story, even with the age appropriate changes.
